card.name: Arsenal Thresher

card.name: Assault // Battery
Balefire Liege
card.text: Other red creatures you control get +1/+1. Other white creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever you cast a red spell, Balefire Liege deals 3 damage to target player. Whenever you cast a white spell, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Battlegate Mimic
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell that's both red and white, Battlegate Mimic becomes 4/2 and gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Beacon of Unrest
card.text: Put target artifact or creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. Shuffle Beacon of Unrest into its owner's library.

card.name: Beast Hunt
card.text: Reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all creature cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

card.text: Search your library for a card with converted mana cost less than or equal to the number of lands you control, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
